thread.section_title: Hotel Central Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location
thread.title_full: Excellent location - Review of Hotel Central Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DaydreamerAustralia
title: Excellent location
text:
So easy to get the RER from CDG airport to St Michel-Notre Dame. From there is an underground walking connection to Cluny-Sorbonne metro station. You pop up on the street about 3 minutes walk from the hotel. Quiet street and located between 2 cinemas. Supermarkets and oodles if restaurants nearby. Walking distance to so many attractions.
Reception staff are very friendly. It was lovely to chat each time we came and went.
